info.summary:
Nick Bassiliades works as a Associate Professor in Dept. of Informatics Aristotle University of Thessaloniki, and his\her h-index is 27, g-index is 45. His\Her interests are :
 Semantic Web; Ontologies; Defeasible Reasoning; Rule Based; Web Service;
